tools.parsing package¶

Submodules¶

tools.parsing.ChASM_lexer module¶

:mod:”ChASM_lexer” – PLY based lexer for ChASM files¶

  1. 2017 The Cronin Group, University of Glasgow

Contains tokens and functions for lexical analysis of the ChASM input file.

For style guide used see http://xkcd.com/1513/

tools.parsing.ChASM_lexer.t_IGNORED(t)[source]¶

#.*n|#.*Z|s+|,

tools.parsing.ChASM_lexer.t_OPCODE(t)[source]¶

b[A-Z_]+b

tools.parsing.ChASM_lexer.t_PS_TOK(t)[source]¶

b[PS]b

tools.parsing.ChASM_lexer.t_error(t)[source]¶

tools.parsing.ChASM_parser module¶

:mod:”ChASM_parser” – PLY based parser for ChASM files¶

  1. 2017 The Cronin Group, University of Glasgow

Contains grammar and functions for parsing a ChASM input file. Essentially, all input is ultimately converted into a list of instructions consisting of a P or S for Parallel or Sequential, an opcode as documented in the COMMAND_LIST, and parameters.

For style guide used see http://xkcd.com/1513/

tools.parsing.ChASM_parser.p_arg(p)[source]¶

arg : NUMBER | variable

tools.parsing.ChASM_parser.p_arg_list(p)[source]¶

arg_list : arg_list arg | arg

tools.parsing.ChASM_parser.p_assign_func(p)[source]¶

assign_func : DEF variable PARENTHESIS_OPEN arg_list PARENTHESIS_CLOSED CURLY_BRACE_OPEN body CURLY_BRACE_CLOSED | DEF variable PARENTHESIS_OPEN PARENTHESIS_CLOSED CURLY_BRACE_OPEN body CURLY_BRACE_CLOSED

tools.parsing.ChASM_parser.p_assign_var(p)[source]¶

assign_var : DEF variable EQUAL_SIGN variable SEMICOLON | DEF variable EQUAL_SIGN NUMBER SEMICOLON

body : instruction | function | for_loop | body instruction | body function | body for_loop

function : variable PARENTHESIS_OPEN arg_list PARENTHESIS_CLOSED SEMICOLON | variable PARENTHESIS_OPEN PARENTHESIS_CLOSED SEMICOLON
